a new city

Moving to a new city

When you move to a new city, the first neighborhood you live in has a special hold on you. In Boston, it was Prudential / Copley. And in SF, itâ€™s the Mission. The Mission is unique in that it feels nostalgic even as you live there in the present.

Emily Lu
July 17, 2019
